full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RENGS DKAR PO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RENGS DKAR PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI MCHID GROGS AEM CHI BKA' BCU PA DANG, NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN GNYIS GZHAN LA PHAN BSAM NAS SOG YUL 'DI KAR ME LHA MCHOD CING GA-YANG BLANG BA'I BKRA SHIS 'BYUNG 'DUG KYANG LHA BSKYED PA MCHOD PA BYIN RLABS SOGS MED PAR PHYIR, SOG YIG TSIG LHANG CAN GYI LUGS 'DZIN PA 'GA' SNANG MAR, RANG RE LA LHA BSKYED PA'I ME MCHOD ZHIG ZHI BYED DGOS ZHES BSKUL NGOR CHOG PAR SBYIN SREG GI THAB BSKYED DANG SLOB DPON PADMA'I MDZAD PA'I GA-YANG 'GUGS BYED KYI 'GA' ZHIG BSDUS NAS @008B RAB 'BYAMS PA NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS KYIS MDZAD PA'I STENG DUNG DU NYER SPYOD LNGA SPEL TSIG DANG BCAS PA LUG GI BRANG DANG MAR KHU DANG MCHOD 'BUL SOGS NOM CHI KE'U SHRI CHOS RJE BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, ,)
